explains: v. 融入，（使）同化；吸收，理解；使相似，成为相似

sentences.en: There is every sign that new Asian-Americans are just as willing to assimilate.
sentences.cn: 各种迹象表明新的亚裔美籍人简直一样愿意被同化。

sentences.en: New arrivals find it hard to assimilate.
sentences.cn: 新来者感到难以融入当地社会。

sentences.en: The committee will need time to assimilate this report.
sentences.cn: 委员会需要时间来吃透这个报告。
